Package io.github.dfx81.database

Class DBManager

java.lang.Object
io.github.dfx81.database.DBManager
public class DBManager extends Object
Handles all database interactions. Uses JDBC-SQLite as a driver.

      The base constructor.

  • Method Details

    • close

      public void close()
      Close connection to the database.

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student)
      Add a student to the database.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be added.

    • addSupervisor

      public void addSupervisor(Supervisor supervisor)
      Add a supervisor to the database.
      Parameters:
      supervisor - The supervisor to be added.

    • addProject

      public void addProject(Project project, Supervisor sv)
      Add a project to the database.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be added.
      sv - The reference to the supervisor related to the project.

    • addRecord

      public void addRecord(Student student, Supervisor supervisor, Project project)
      A quick way to add student, supervisor, and project.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be added.
      supervisor - The supervisor to be added.
      project - The project to be added.

      Get the list of projects.
      Returns:
      The list of projects.

    • getStudentData

      public ArrayList<String[]> getStudentData(int matricno)
      Get the data from the student's matric no.
      Parameters:
      matricno - The matric no of the student.
      Returns:
      The list of data from the student. Can return multiple data.

    • getStudentData

      public String[] getStudentData(String projectId)
      Get the student data related to a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The project id of the project to access.
      Returns:
      A single data about the student specific to the project.

    • getSupervisorData

      public ArrayList<String[]> getSupervisorData(int staffno)
      Get the data based on the supervisor's staff no. Can return multiple supervisors.
      Parameters:
      staffno - The staff no. of the record to access.
      Returns:
      The list of supervisors data.

    • getSupervisorData

      public ArrayList<String[]> getSupervisorData(String name)
      Get the data specific to a supervisor based on their name. Only returns a single supervisor.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the supervisor.
      Returns:
      The data about a specific supervisor.

    • addRecords

      public void addRecords(ArrayList<Student> students, ArrayList<Supervisor> supervisors, ArrayList<Project> projects)
      Add a list of students, supervisors, and projects to the database.
      Parameters:
      students - The list of students to be added.
      supervisors - The list of supervisors to be added.
      projects - The list of projects to be added.

    • updateBotData

      public void updateBotData()
      Update the bot info. Mainly used to update the database version after each scheduled update.

    • getBotData

      public String[] getBotData()
      Get data about the bot.
      Returns:
      The bot data.

    • getSemester

      public ArrayList<String[]> getSemester(String sem)
      Get the Semester of the Student.
      Returns:
      The Student with their data in their respective Semester.

    • getSemesterSup

      public ArrayList<String[]> getSemesterSup(String sem)
      Get the Semester of the Supervisor.
      Parameters:
      sem - The Semester of the Supervisor.
      Returns:
      The Supervisor with their data in their respective Semester.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The Student with their race in their respective Semester.

      public ArrayList<String[]> getStudSem()
